title: Cry Of Distress(?!): COVID ‘Vaccines’ Are Compromising Human Innate Immune Systems, Turning ‘Vaccinated’ Humans Into ‘Global Gain Of Function’ (GOF) Experiment (CLAIMS DR. GEERT VANDEN BOSSCHE)
cleaned_text:
Publisher’s Note: Geert Vanden Bossche PhD, is an internationally recognized vaccine developer, having worked as the head of the Vaccine Development Office at the German Centre for Infection Research. Dr. Bossche coordinated the Global Alliance for Vaccines and Immunization (GAVI), the Ebola Vaccine Program, and contributed to the implementation of an integrated vaccine work plan in collaboration with Global Health Partners (WHO, Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, CDC, UNICEF), regulators (FDA) and vaccine manufacturers to enable timely deployment or stockpiling of Ebola vaccine candidates. Using prophylactic “vaccines” in the midst of the COVID “pandemic,” Dr. Bossche states, is likely to create more more viral variants in the process and, more ominously, destroy vaccinated Humans’ innate immune system ability to ward off COVID viral variants. The result? Vaccinated” Humans are becoming a giant global “Gain Of Function” (GOF) experiment. Here’s a useful summary with links and deeper context. Please share widely for public discussion.

Please support Vermont Independent’s work through our Patreon page.
